title: L&D Market, Inc. Recalls Chicken Wrap Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, June 29, 2018 L&D Market, Inc., a Boston, Mass. establishment, is recalling approximately three pounds of chicken wrap products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain milk, a known...
